code: import React from'react';import'./Hero.css';import Bin95Logo from'./assets/bin95.jpg';import SAPLogo from'./assets/sap.jpeg';import BerkeleyLogo from'./assets/ucb.jpeg';import TaiyoLogo from'./assets/taiy_logo.jpeg';import RevoLogo from'./assets/revocube.jpeg';import PostoLogo from'./assets/posto.jpeg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Hero3=_ref=>{let{setCurrentPage,prev,next}=_ref;const experiences=[{company:"SAP SE",role:"Development Intern",icon:SAPLogo},{company:"Posto-Social Inc.",role:"Software Engineer Intern",icon:PostoLogo},{company:"Bin95 Industrial Training",role:"Senior Contract Developer",icon:Bin95Logo},{company:"Taiyō.AI",role:"Contract Developer",icon:TaiyoLogo},{company:"Berkeley IT",role:"Student IT Technician",icon:BerkeleyLogo},{company:"Revocube Technologies Limited",role:"Software Developer Intern",icon:RevoLogo}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"hero",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Experiences"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"experiences-grid",children:experiences.map((exp,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"experience-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:exp.icon,alt:"".concat(exp.company," logo"),className:"experience-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"experience-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:exp.company}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:exp.role})]})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navigation-hint top-hint",onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(1),children:prev}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navigation-hint bottom-hint",onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(3),children:next})]});};export default Hero3;
